Category: Serums & Essences

book: 2071-Mirabella Beauty Amp Lash & Brow Enhancing Serum

chunk:
lcellulose, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate.

Directions: Apply serum in a single stroke to the base of the lashes and brows. Allow serum to dry completely for one to two minutes. For best results, apply morning and night.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive T
